title: Null Pointer Exception on Login Page
description: When clicking the login button, a null pointer exception is thrown, preventing users from logging in.

title: Dark Mode Theme
description: Implement a new dark mode theme option for the application.

title: Refactor Database Schema
description: Restructure the database schema to improve performance and simplify data retrieval.

title: Incorrect Calculation in Sales Report
description: The sales report is displaying incorrect totals for some products.

title: Add User Authentication
description: Implement user authentication functionality to secure the application.

title: Integration with Third-Party API
description: Integrate the application with a third-party API to fetch real-time data.

title: Error in Email Validation
description: The email validation logic is incorrectly marking some valid emails as invalid.

title: Export Data to CSV
description: Add an option to export application data to CSV format for further analysis.

title: Improve User Interface
description: Enhance the user interface to provide a more intuitive and user-friendly experience.

title: Incorrect Sorting in Product List
description: The product list is not sorted correctly based on the specified sorting criteria.

title: Error in Payment Processing
description: Some payments are not being processed correctly, leading to incomplete transactions.

title: Implement Localization Support
description: Add support for multiple languages and implement localization in the application.

title: Advanced Search Functionality
description: Enhance the search functionality to provide advanced filtering options and improve search accuracy.

title: Image Upload Error
description: Users encounter an error when uploading images to their profiles.

title: Social Media Sharing Integration
description: Integrate social media sharing options to allow users to share content from the application.

title: Optimize Database Queries
description: Review and optimize the existing database queries for improved performance.

title: Incorrect Calculation in Pricing Module
description: The pricing module is producing incorrect calculations for certain products.

title: Implement User Roles and Permissions
description: Define user roles and implement permission-based access control in the application.

title: Real-Time Chat Functionality
description: Develop a real-time chat feature to enable instant communication between users.

title: Error in Data Export
description: Exported data is missing certain fields and not formatted correctly.

title: Integration with Payment Gateway
description: Integrate the application with a payment gateway to facilitate online transactions.

title: Improve Performance of Image Upload
description: Optimize the image upload process to reduce upload time and improve performance.

title: Incorrect Calculation in Inventory Management
description: The inventory management system is miscalculating stock levels for some products.

title: Error in Password Reset Functionality
description: Users are unable to reset their passwords due to an error in the password reset feature.

title: Implement Email Notifications
description: Develop and implement email notification system for important events and updates.

title: Integration with Google Maps API
description: Integrate Google Maps API to provide location-based services in the application.

title: Error in Report Generation
description: Generating reports for a specific date range produces inaccurate results.

title: Multiple User Account Support
description: Allow users to create and manage multiple accounts within the application.

title: Code Documentation
description: Document the codebase to improve code maintainability and facilitate future development.

title: Error in Discount Calculation
description: The discount calculation logic is not applied correctly for certain products.

title: Implement Single Sign-On
description: Integrate single sign-on functionality to allow users to log in with their existing credentials.

title: Image Cropping Functionality
description: Implement image cropping feature to allow users to adjust and crop uploaded images.

title: Error in Data Import
description: Imported data from external sources is not being processed correctly and causing data inconsistencies.

title: Advanced Analytics Dashboard
description: Develop a comprehensive analytics dashboard to visualize key performance indicators and trends.

title: Improve Error Handling
description: Enhance the error handling mechanism to provide more informative and user-friendly error messages.

title: Error in Customer Registration
description: Some customers are unable to register due to an error in the registration process.

title: Implement Data Backup Mechanism
description: Develop a system to automatically backup application data at regular intervals.

title: Integration with Social Login APIs
description: Allow users to log in using their social media accounts such as Facebook, Google, etc.

title: Error in Checkout Process
description: Users encounter an error when trying to complete the checkout process.

title: Mobile App Integration
description: Develop mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms and integrate them with the existing backend.

title: Improve Data Validation
description: Enhance the data validation mechanism to ensure data integrity and prevent data corruption.

title: Error in Order Processing
description: Some orders are not being processed correctly, resulting in delayed or missing shipments.

title: Error in Image Rendering
description: Images are not rendering correctly in certain browsers or devices.

title: Integration with Email Marketing Services
description: Integrate the application with email marketing services for targeted email campaigns.

title: Code Refactoring for Performance Optimization
description: Refactor the codebase to optimize performance and reduce resource consumption.

title: Error in User Profile Editing
description: Users are unable to edit their profiles due to an error in the profile editing feature.

title: Implement User Activity Logging
description: Capture and log user activity for auditing and analysis purposes.

title: Integration with SMS Notification Service
description: Integrate SMS notification service to send important updates and notifications to users.

title: Error in Search Functionality
description: Some search queries do not return accurate results or fail to find relevant content.

title: Data Import from Excel Files
description: Implement the ability to import data from Excel files into the application.

title: Implement Caching Mechanism
description: Introduce a caching mechanism to store and retrieve frequently accessed data for improved performance.

title: Error in Credit Card Validation
description: The credit card validation logic is incorrectly rejecting some valid credit cards.

title: Error in API Response
description: The API responses are occasionally returning incorrect or inconsistent data.

title: Integration with CRM System
description: Integrate the application with a customer relationship management (CRM) system for streamlined customer management.

title: Improve Password Security
description: Enhance password security measures, including password encryption and complexity requirements.

title: Error in Email Sending
description: Some emails are not being sent successfully, resulting in missed notifications.
